body:
Seems like AMAs are in fashion right now, and I want to be like the kool kidz, so here goes.
I was formally known as Notalgicular. I used to play Avicus daily, but recently I have been lurking in the shadows and not many people know me any more :(
Ask me (almost) anything

Ask me (almost) anything
title: [AMA] Notal

Dream job?
